review.comment: I had work done on 5-11-21. I almost never write reviews but I must in this case. Five-Star in every respect. review.comment: Well done outstanding Job 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾 Mr Shuki Ram  And Team Are professionals and their work is outstanding it was done less than hours  same day job great service on time service can’t ask for a better company  We love our new garage out with the old and in with the new and the Bluetooth service is outstanding you can be able to open up your garage anyway around the country thank you again.

I am posting this review once again because I still don't see the review I already tried to post posted yet and Shuki of Professional Garage Door Service deserves a review worthy of the service he provided!

Our Condo association needed a garage door motor for our large door.  No only was this a more industrial like door we also had some added features to contend with:  a red/green traffic light system and a timer system.

I will admit at first I was reluctant to reach out to Professional Garage Door Service since I had never heard of them.  Also we have had work done by two other well known garage door services and I wondered if we should stick with one of them.  I am very glad that I reached out to Shuki of Professional Garage Door Service.  First he was a pleasure to interact with at our first meeting.  He was patient, and listened to our concerns and answered our questions.  When I asked him whether we also needed at that moment to replace our springs and our door as well as the motor that was already dead he ethically and honestly answered no not at this time.  No attempt by him to gouge for more work and more money..

Now of course we only just recently got our motor repaired so we originally knew we would have to wait to see how his company would respond to our service calls.  Still we had the following experience with him that makes me believe he would be just as excellent on any future service calls.  During motor repair we had one unexpected issue arise.    During our installation we had one unexpected issue arise:  Shuki did not try to make up stories charge us more than the original bid.  He said don't worry I will take care of this.  He did!  He also did so promptly.

He comes when he says he will come.  He sets time frames and meets them.  He and his workers are professional and neat.  He is knowledgeable.  It is our plan to use him moving forward.  Now our secret is out: an honest hard worker!

Thank you Shuki for your great work!
review.review_reply: Thank you Judith for your kind words. It is a pleasure to work with you and World Plaza. We are here when you need us!

review.comment: Could not be more satisfied with their service and quality I received from this company. Called them on Sunday at 11am, my Garage was fixed by 1 PM.  Very courteous and prompt. I will use them again.
Great guy
review.review_reply: We appreciate your kind feedback and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Please do not hesitate to call us in the future, Josh!

review.comment: Professional, timely, quality work! Shuki and team are the best! Looking for a garage door company? Professional Garage Door Service should be the one.
Amazing service, very professional work ,reasonable price the most reliable contractor

Couldn't be happier!! Great job mixed with cordiality and professionalism. I will recommend Professional Garage Door Service to anyone who needs to replace a garage door. Now I can even open or close the door by using my phone. How cool is that?

review.comment: I am a real estate broker in homeowner for 36 years. Over the years I have met many contractors good great bad and very bad. It is my pleasure tell you how professional garage door is an I have been delighted to meet them take care of my problem. Shuki and Johnny are in my category of the best I've ever met in my life as a homeowner. They needed to view the job before quoting a price. They proposed the plan and price which was reasonable. I told them the house was in contract for sale and that the new buyers would probably replace the garage door. They offered me an alternate plan and the price was acceptable and I agreed to have the work done. to save me money when they started the job they found that there was more work to be done for the money they quoted me. They never charged me anything more than that what they quoted me and took longer than expected to complete the job with problems. Besides offering very fast service they came the day I called them, notified me when they were on their way to my home, called me when they arrive, and we're here in the time frame that they told me they would be at my home. They did far more work and what they charge me for but they honored their commitment to me at the price they quoted me not knowing that they would incur many problems to repair my garage door.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for your kind word it was out pleasure to meet you and serve you wishing you a good luck with you now house and we here to serve you any time

review.comment:
I would highly recommend Professional Garage Door Services for anyone who is looking for professional and reliable services for their garage doors.

The two experiences we had with the company were very pleasant. We met with Mr. Shuki and John who identified the problems that needed to be fixed and promptly provided their services.

They were easy to reach over the phone when trying to address our concerns, they made it easy to schedule a day and time for the repairs, they were prompt when it came to showing up on time as discussed, and explained to us in detail about what needed to be done.

We have experienced at many other places when we scheduled repairs where people show up very late and make us wait or they don't even show up at all sometimes, but this company keeps their word.

Overall, we greatly appreciated the fact that they were friendly, hard-working, courteous, reliable, and professional individuals. Without a doubt, we would look for them again in the future.

review.comment:
Upon arriving from vacation on a cold and raining day, I came to find out the only way into my home was through the garage. Unfortunately, the door was jammed shut after numerous attempts to open the garage door. In panic and exhaustion since returning from vacation, I reached out to close friends with efforts to receive a recommendation on garage service repairs.
Profesional garage services were the only ones to constantly update on expected arrival times with a sense of urgency. The representative Shuki arrived and it took him less than 10 minutes to get the job done. I say 10 minutes since my garage door opener is quite antiquated.  He provided resolutions for future issues, and got the job done promptly. I would definitely use and recommend their services. Thank you Professional Garage Services!

review.comment: i had Shuki  Ram from professional garage door replaced my garage door in our house in Tenafly NJ.I  saw his  business add in a local Facebook group in my community , and i decided to hire him. i was watching him doing the job, and i was impressed with his technical skills, he had to remove a very old garage door and adjust the old  rails to fit to the new door ,which was a long job by itself,he didn't charge me any extra for that. he  has done an excellent job ,showed  up  on time we agreed upon,and i paid  the price we agreed upon.the new door fits perfectly .great work, no hidden fee's .take my word.he is good at what he does.
